attributes.action: To scrap the plans to charge the British people for the weighing of there rubbish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You stated that you were willing to listen to the people of this country dont you consider the weighing of bins for extra funds a utter disgrace to impose more financial burdens on the most vulnerable citizen with a scheme that will never work .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
